messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] east coast humidity
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/03 5:03:35 PM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:    It will be just like Saskatoon.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/29/03 5:03:35 PM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< I don't know---she's STUCK being HERE in August! <G> >>

It will be just like Saskatoon.
Air conditioned airplane, air conditioned airport, short ride in air
conditioned car (in Saskatoon it was called "heater on") and luxurious stay
in air conditioned hotel (or hospital).

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] east coast humidity
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/2003 6:03:05 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I don t know---she s STUCK being HERE in August!  ~Kelly, Wheeze, wheeze [Non-text

~Kelly, Wheeze, wheeze
